value:
$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|It was only a short while ago...$k$pRinkah, Forrest, Lilith, and Midori
had just arrived in Askr...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|Sorry to...put you out of your way...$k$p$WmMPID_フォレオ,ch05_52_Foleo_M_Normal,Face|Just lie back, Princess Fjorm!
Don't try to stand!$k$p$WmMPID_リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Normal,Face|She has no injuries, yet is
in such intense pain that she
cannot bear to stand...$k$p$WmMPID_リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_Normal,Face|Could this be some kind of...I don't
know...magical curse?$k$pIt's got Prince Alfonse and
Princess Sharena too, after all.$k$p$WmMPID_フォレオ,ch05_52_Foleo_M_Normal,Face|Why does it seem like we're the only
ones in the castle who are unaffected
by this?$k$p$WmMPID_リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Normal,Face|It's up to us to do something, or the
Order of Heroes is finished...and
Askr with it.$k$p$WmMPID_リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_Normal,Face|Come on, there has to be a fix.
Maybe a healer from Hoshido
could help...$k$p$WmMPID_ミドリコ,ch05_54_Midoriko_F_Normal,Face|I've been observing the symptoms.
I might be able to put an herbal
remedy together.$k$p$WmMPID_リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_Normal,Face|Why didn't you say so? Hurry up
and get to it, then!$k$p$WmMPID_ミドリコ,ch05_54_Midoriko_F_Normal,Face|It's not that simple. I'll need a rare
herb. Mountainweed.$k$p$WmMPID_リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Normal,Face|Mountain...weed? Sounds odd,
but I can run to market and see
if they have some there.$k$p$WmMPID_ミドリコ,ch05_54_Midoriko_F_Normal,Face|Like I said, it's rare—and it only grows
in very high places. I doubt they'll
have any for sale here.$k$pIt should grow on the mountain peaks
here in Askr, though.$k$p$WmMPID_リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_Normal,Face|We'll just have to find it ourselves
and go from there.$k$p$WmMPID_ミドリコ,ch05_54_Midoriko_F_Normal,Face|Seems so... But we're the only ones
still on our feet, so we have to help!$k$p$WmMPID_リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Normal,Face|It really is all up to us, isn't it?
All right—let's be on our way!$k$p
